title.rendered: Kohli shares video recorded by fan in his hotel room, says ‘Not okay with this invasion of privacy’

content.rendered:
During his absence, a fan filmed and uploaded a video of Virat Kohli‘s hotel room on social media.

He wrote,

This video…made me feel…paranoid about my privacy. If I cannot have privacy in my own hotel room, then where can I…expect any personal space at all?? I’m NOT okay with this…fanaticism and absolute invasion of privacy.

Read Also: Wasim Akram advises Babar for having intelligence
